title: Miona Springs
text:
Miona Springs is a <a href="Spring%20%28hydrology%29">spring</a> in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>.
"Miona" is a name of a fictional <a href="Indian%20princess">Indian princess</a> character taken from a Civil War-era work. It was once believed that the waters of Miona Springs had healing properties, and in 1915 a <a href="mineral%20spa">mineral spa</a> resort stood there.
